div.ab: Account by Amiantos in the 3rd year of Emperor;Augustus in the month of Caesarios [ --- of expenses outstanding;in my account.;Price of olive-wood for [---;cypress-wood for the store-room [---;padding for the marking-device of the sail (?) [---;tow for caulking [---;mulberry-woo for the floor [---;cypress-wood, 6 pieces, for planks and [---;5 pieces, and other wood of the Persea three for [---;"krupte" and device for the sail [---;"akouchoi" for the cabin and [---;10, each 12 drachmas [---;bedgirths for the same purpose, 10 [---;linen (sailcloth) and fair leads [---;wages of the Cilicians [---;sackcloth for the sail [---;balls of thread [--- for the ;Cilician cloth;nails, 2 mnas, for storage [---;tow, 5 mnas, for the steering-[oar boxes ---;rings for the boards and tools [---;foreign straps for oar-straps [---;make 418 drachmas and 4 obols.
